org.agilewiki.jactor2.common.widgets.buffers

Class TransmutableByteBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.common.widgets.buffers.TransmutableByteBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transmutable<UnmodifiableByteBufferFactory>

    public class TransmutableByteBuffer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transmutable<UnmodifiableByteBufferFactory>
    A transmutable wrapper of a byte buffer.
